item.title: S&P警告在预算争夺战中可能下调芝加哥信用评级
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司的分析师称，芝加哥的信用评级受到威胁，因为该市正在考虑使用一次性预算平衡措施来弥补巨大的资金缺口。【原文：Chicago’s credit rating is threatened as the city mulls using one-time budget-balancing measures to close a gaping shortfall, according to analysts from S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 中国银行上月大幅下调贷款利率后保持稳定
item.description: 继上月大幅下调基准贷款利率后，中国各银行继续维持基准利率不变。【原文：Chinese banks held their benchmark lending rates following a major cut last month.】

item.title: 中国的 "太空帆船 "将在巴西挑战埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "计划
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在卫星互联网业务方面的中国竞争对手计划于 2026 年在巴西开始运营，这家总部位于上海的公司负责人周二告诉彭博新闻社。【原文：Elon Musk’s Chinese rival in the satellite internet business plans to start operations in Brazil in 2026, the head of the Shanghai-based company told Bloomberg News Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚预算收入增幅较小，企业税减少
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，随着主要贸易伙伴中国经济降温和本地就业市场放缓，澳大利亚面临着更具挑战性的财政前景，这表明税收收入的提升幅度将小于往年。【原文：Australia faces a more challenging fiscal outlook as key trading partner China cools and the local job market loosens, suggesting tax revenue upgrades will be smaller than in previous years, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said.】

item.title: 伊藤家族寻求在 2024 年底前完成交易，7-Eleven 所有者业绩大增
item.description: 日本 NHK 广播公司报道称，零售巨头 Seven & i 控股公司的创始家族正寻求在今年年底前完成将公司私有化的交易，该公司股价在东京早盘交易中一度跳涨达 10%。【原文：Shares of Seven & i Holdings Co. jumped as much as 10% in early Tokyo trading after Japanese broadcaster NHK reported the founding family of the retail giant is looking to complete a deal to take the company private by the end of this year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯核转变激发避风港需求，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 随着俄罗斯对乌克兰战争的紧张局势升级，避险资产需求上升，黄金连续两天攀升。【原文：Gold held a two-day climb, with rising demand for haven assets following an escalation of tensions in Russia’s war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国移动讨论收购互联网服务提供商 HKBN 的潜在交易
item.description: 全球用户数量最多的无线运营商中国移动正在洽谈收购香港宽带服务提供商香港宽带有限公司（HKBN Ltd. ）的可能性，以扩大其在香港的业务范围。【原文：China Mobile, the world’s largest wireless carrier by subscribers, is in talks on a potential acquisition of Hong Kong broadband provider HKBN Ltd. as it looks to expand its footprint in the city.】

item.title: 艾略特股权报告发布后，东京燃气股价创 1987 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）宣布收购了东京燃气公司 5.03% 的股份后，该公司股价在周三早盘交易中一度上涨 15%，创下自 1987 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Tokyo Gas Co.’s stock rose 15% at one point in early trading Wednesday, its biggest climb since 1987, after Elliott Investment Management reported it had acquired 5.03% of the utility company’s shares.】

item.title: 报告称英国官方统计少算了 100 万个工作岗位
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，英国低估了近 100 万就业人口的数量，该报告进一步怀疑了对英格兰银行至关重要的官方估计。【原文：Britain has underestimated the number of people in employment by almost 1 million, according to a new report that casts further doubt on official estimates that are crucial for the Bank of England.】

item.title: 美元反弹遭遇 "波涛汹涌"，双向交易回归
item.description: 一些关键的市场指标开始表明，随着美国大选引发的看涨情绪减弱，特朗普激发的美元涨势可能已经趋于平稳。【原文：Some key market metrics are starting to suggest the Trump-inspired rally in the dollar may have plateaued, as bullishness fueled by the US election wanes.】

item.title: 日本出口在全球风险中增长，支持经济复苏
item.description: 日本 10 月份的出口增长超过预期，因为即使在主要海外市场不确定性增加的情况下，全球需求仍基本保持坚挺。【原文：Japan’s exports picked up more than expected in October as global demand held more or less firm even in the face of mounting uncertainties in key overseas markets.】

item.title: 医院业主 MPT 接管前景医疗实体
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一封信函副本，美国最大的医院业主之一医疗地产信托公司（Medical Properties Trust Inc.【原文：Medical Properties Trust Inc., one of the largest hospital landlords in the US, has moved to take control of three Southern California health care entities after accusing the owner — Prospect Medical Holdings — of defaulting on debt, according to a copy of a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于一份行业报告显示，在政府官方数据公布之前，美国原油库存有所增加，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady as an industry report signaled a build in US crude inventories ahead of official government figures.】

item.title: 市场综述：英伟达事件前亚洲股市将谨慎行事
item.description: 由于交易商在等待全球最有价值公司的最新财报的同时，也在评估日益加剧的地缘政治风险，亚洲股市开局低迷。比特币延续了大选后的涨势。【原文：Stocks in Asia were poised for a sluggish start as traders assess heightened geopolitical risks while awaiting the latest earnings from the world’s most valuable company. Bitcoin extended its post-election rally.】

item.title: 坦帕湾射线队体育场计划面临风险，债券审批被推迟
item.description: 坦帕湾雷鸟队周二表示，该队位于佛罗里达州圣彼得堡的新体育馆可能无法在 2028 赛季前准备就绪，因为县委员委员会未能在 10 月 29 日的最后期限前敲定一项重要的债券决议。【原文：The Tampa Bay Rays’ new stadium in St. Petersburg, Florida, may not be ready in time for the 2028 season after a board of county commissioners failed to finalize a crucial bond resolution by an Oct. 29 deadline, the team said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 老虎机运营商千亿国际娱乐报告黑客事件
item.description: 国际游戏技术公司（International Game Technology Plc）是一家赌场常用老虎机的运营商，该公司称，有未经授权的第三方进入了其某些系统。【原文：International Game Technology Plc, operator of popular slot machines in casinos, said an unauthorized third party gained access to certain of its systems.】

item.title: 加拿大安全审查推迟了帕拉丁公司对裂变公司的收购
item.description: 加拿大联邦政府正在延长对帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd.）收购裂变铀公司（Fission Uranium Corp.）的国家安全审查，进一步推迟了本应在 9 月份完成的交易。【原文：Canada’s federal government is extending a national security review of Paladin Energy Ltd.’s acquisition of Fission Uranium Corp., further delaying a deal that was supposed to close in September.】

item.title: T-Mobile 提前抓住黑客，避免了数据泄露
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，T-Mobile US Inc. 在最近的一次网络漏洞波及客户手机之前，已经将其控制住了。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. was able to contain a recent network breach before it reached customers’ phones, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bling Capital 融资 2.7 亿美元，投资新兴初创企业
item.description: Bling Capital 是一家风险投资公司，以最早成立的初创企业为目标，在大多数风险投资行业面临困难的时候，该公司已经筹集了 2.7 亿美元。【原文：Bling Capital, a venture firm targeting the earliest of startups, has raised $270 million at a difficult time for most of the venture capital industry.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司首席执行官认为特朗普有利于企业发展
item.description: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司（Motorola Solutions Inc.首席执行官格雷格-布朗（Greg Brown）表示，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将上任的政府将有利于摩托罗拉公司这个已经做得很好的企业。【原文：Motorola Solutions Inc. Chief Executive Officer Greg Brown said the incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump will be favorable to a business that’s already doing very well.】

item.title: 摩根大通技术主席期待更快的监管审查和更多的首次公开募股
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）技术投资银行部全球主席表示，有数百家私营技术公司正在等待首次公开募股市场的开放，美国大选的明朗化有望为有望上市的公司注入一剂强心针。【原文：There are hundreds of private technology companies waiting for the market for initial public offerings to open up, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. global chair of technology investment banking, with clarity on the US election expected to provide a shot in the arm for listing hopefuls.】

item.title: 老虎种子 "基金起诉罗伯逊的公司终止利润分享
item.description: 朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）的一家 "老虎种子 "基金提起诉讼，要求宣布 2004 年的投资协议无效，根据该协议，这位已故对冲基金先驱提供了数百万美元的启动资金，以换取未来的利润分成。【原文：One of Julian Robertson’s “Tiger seed” funds is suing to invalidate the 2004 investment deal by which the late hedge fund pioneer provided millions in startup capital in exchange for a share of future profits.】

item.title: 新西兰西太平洋银行首席执行官敦促金融科技认证加速开放银行业务
item.description: 新西兰西太平洋银行首席执行官凯瑟琳-麦格拉思（Catherine McGrath）表示，如果新西兰希望开放银行业务得到消费者的支持，就应该考虑为新兴金融科技公司建立认证制度。【原文：New Zealand should consider an accreditation regime for emerging fintechs if it wants open banking to get support from consumers, according to Westpac New Zealand Chief Executive Office Catherine McGrath.】

item.title: 债券交易员认为空头回报受限，跌势买家出现
item.description: 随着买家的出现，国债市场上的特朗普交易正在碰壁，以阻止大选后债券收益率的飙升。【原文：The Trump trade in the Treasury market is hitting a wall as buyers have emerged to halt the post-election leap in bond yields.】

item.title: 高通公司预计到 2029 年将从扩产竞标中获利 220 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的智能手机处理器销售商高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc., the world’s biggest seller of smartphone processors, is expecting its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion in annual revenue by fiscal 2029.】

item.title: DT Midstream 将以 12 亿美元收购三条 Oneok 管道
item.description: DT Midstream Inc. 已达成一项协议，将以 12 亿美元的价格从 Oneok Inc.【原文：DT Midstream Inc. has reached an agreement to buy three natural gas transmission pipelines from Oneok Inc. for $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 亚洲加密货币热点从美国引发的创纪录涨势中获得收益
item.description: 诞生于美国的破纪录加密货币涨势正在亚洲留下印记，包括不丹持有的比特币价值跃升至 10 亿美元以上，以及韩国数字资产交易量激增。【原文：A record-breaking crypto rally born in the US is leaving its mark on Asia, including a jump in the value of Bitcoin held by Bhutan to more than $1 billion and a surge in digital-asset trading volumes in South Korea.】

item.title: 特朗普和普京破坏了习近平对低关税稳定世界的推动力
item.description: 对习近平来说，两次全球峰会的主要目标是推动建立一个贸易壁垒更少的和平世界，以便他能集中精力振兴中国经济。唐纳德-特朗普和弗拉基米尔-普京打乱了这些计划。【原文：For Xi Jinping, the main objective during two global summits was to push for a peaceful world with fewer trade barriers so he can focus on reviving China’s economy. Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin disrupted those plans.】

item.title: ADIA、GIC 称即将收购派巴克火灾公司；安全公司持有少数股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比投资局和新加坡 GIC 私人有限公司正在就收购 Pye-Barker Fire & Safety 少数股权进行深入谈判，包括债务在内，该公司的估值将超过 60 亿美元。【原文：The Abu Dhabi Investment Authority and Singapore’s GIC Pte. are in advanced talks to acquire a minority stake in Pye-Barker Fire & Safety in a deal that would value the company at more than $6 billion including debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 如果没有税收减免，美国电动汽车需求将下降 27
item.description: 据经济学家估计，取消美国电动汽车税收抵免将削弱未来的电动汽车需求，可能会减少四分之一以上，同时对汽油消费的促进作用微乎其微。【原文：Eliminating the US electric vehicle tax credit would dent future EV demand — perhaps by more than a fourth — while providing a trivial boost to gasoline consumption, economists estimate.】
